main event: On July 8, 1959, an object was observed moving up and down along a definite flight path for a total of 6 to 8 minutes.
interesting points: The object exhibited up and down movements but maintained a defined flight trajectory,The sighting time was documented as 6 to 8 minutes,It was noted that observations of the object could be caused by reflections,Four civilians witnessed the event,The initial observation was described as being at a 45-degree angle above the horizon.
